DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Wolf GPS Location Data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: csv file containing GPS location data of wolves from northeast British Columbia. Note that data have been cleaned as per the methods outlines in the Journal of Animal Ecology paper.
